body.p: This page gives the Oracc PUA signs in Oracc PUA section 9.4 which contains glyphs for Proto-Cuneiform (PC) numbers that will probably not be encoded as Unicode codepoints.
See the Oracc PUA page for general notes on the columns in this table..
In addition, this page uses the abbreviations:

dl.dd: Out Of Range: used for number signs which are outside of the expected range relative to the systems in which they normally function.
